\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w know|strong="H3045"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H0589"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w have|strong="H3045"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w spoken|strong="H1696"\w* \w in|strong="H0413"\w* \w vain|strong="H2600"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H0589"\w* \w would|strong="H3068"\w* \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \w this|strong="H2063"\w* \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w them|strong="H0413"\w*.
